content.description:
One of the early classics in the Boone County area.  

  A long pitch gets you to the top of the crack and RF dihedral.
content.location: The obvious crack in a RF dihedral about a half mile S of Rocheport.

content.description:
The largest roof crack in the area with a bat hang rest to boot! 

  Climb up into the cave and belay in the back. Head out the roof crack to a belay at the lip. A final pitch was top roped heading up and right but needs bolts and was never bolted. If someone would like to bolt this go for it.  The rating is a guess as it was a long time ago but I believe the roof was 5.10 and the final pitch 5.11.
content.location: The large cave just south of the Rocheport I-70 bridge

content.description: A long set of cliffs running above the Katy Trail near the I-70 bridge over the Missouri River.
